metadata.name: Palakkad Vibes!
metadata.description:
Get ready to jump into a new world with Ava & Ramona! 

I thought to give a new experience to Ava and Ramona by taking them to my native place, Palakkad. So they travel from a city in the US to the green plains of Palakkad, wearing their most colorful masks created by Abhilash Nair.

Palakkad is a beautiful place with hills, rivers, & mountain streams. It's a city in Kerala, a state in southwestern India.

'Palakkad Vibes' is my first collaboration with another native from Palakkad and amazing animator, Abhilash Nair. He created two exclusive masks for AVA & Ramona, and as you see, they adore them!
